rightValue.stringValue: Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On

Flow.description: SFCPQBLG-1383 (Page 4) Add Payment Type to Sales Survey SFCPQBLG-1346 Update wording on completed sales survey screen SFCPQBLG-1349 Change the length of fields below Page 2) Other Features (Page 3) Other - Essentials Products that will not be installed (Page 3) Other - Existing Applications (Page 3) If not NPP, Why (Page 3) Other (Page 4 - Customer Goals) Concept of Goals (Page 4 - Customer Goals) Details (Page 4 - Customer Goals) Aligned Solutions (Page 4) Details (Page 4) SMB Consulting Notes

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This is to fetch offering type from quote
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Offering

formulas.name: SSbuisnessFunction
formulas.expression: IF ( INCLUDES ( {!GetQuoteorSSRecords.SBQQ__PrimaryContact__r.Business_Function__c}, "Billing-Customer AP" ), "Billing-Customer AP; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!GetQuoteorSSRecords.SBQQ__PrimaryContact__r.Business_Function__c}, "Billing-Invoice Approver" ), "Billing-Invoice Approver; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!GetQuoteorSSRecords.SBQQ__PrimaryContact__r.Business_Function__c} , "Collection-Customer AP" ), "Collection-Customer AP; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ({!GetQuoteorSSRecords.SBQQ__PrimaryContact__r.Business_Function__c} , "Collection-Invoice Approver-1" ), "Collection-Invoice Approver-1; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!GetQuoteorSSRecords.SBQQ__PrimaryContact__r.Business_Function__c} , "Collection-Invoice Approver-2" ), "Collection-Invoice Approver-2; ",null )

Flow.label: qtc_CreateSalesSurvey

recordLookups.description: get order details based on quote id
recordLookups.name: getOrderDetails
recordLookups.label: getOrderDetails

fields.name: ExistingApplicationValidation
fields.fieldText:
﻿At least one in Existing Application section should be selected if Sales Type is Either of below :

  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware
  • Traditional Refresh (like for like)
  • Traditional Refresh with Add On

Method and Processor need to be selected if Sales Type is Either of below :

  • Aloha Essentials New Install
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware

fields.name: test11
fields.fieldText:
At least one in Essentials Products that WILL NOT be installed section should be selected if Sales Type is Either of below :

  • Aloha Essentials New Install
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware

Please also check for below warnings :


Method and Processor need to be selected if Sales Type is Either of below :

  • Aloha Essentials New Install
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware

At least one in Existing Application section should be selected if Sales Type is Either of below :

  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware
  • Traditional Refresh (like for like)
  • Traditional Refresh with Add On

fields.name: locationcheck
fields.fieldText: Location need to fill if Copy of DB is yes

fields.name: SSCreatedAlready
fields.fieldText: Sales Survey is already created on this quote. You can not create another Sales Survey

fields.name: tesing1234
fields.fieldText:
Method and Processor need to be selected if Sales Type is Either of below :

  • Aloha Essentials New Install
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware

Please check for below Warnings as well


At least one in Existing Application section should be selected if Sales Type is Either of below :

  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware
  • Traditional Refresh (like for like)
  • Traditional Refresh with Add On

fields.name: NppIsreq
fields.fieldText: If not NPP, Why is required if Processor is not NCR Processing

fields.name: OLDKeyRefresh
fields.fieldText:
Old Key Refresh is Required if Sales Type is one of following :

  • Aloha Essentials New Install
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware

fields.name: SSIsCompleteErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Sales Survey data can only be edited when in Draft status and Technical Review status is Recalled, Rejected or Null . To make any changes to Sales Survey quote need to be recalled first

fields.name: SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText:
Sales Survey has been saved!


Next Step: If quote is Approved you must submit for Technical Review via the Quote Page.

fields.name: NPPValidations
fields.fieldText: If Processor = 'NCR Processing' ,NPP Processing Options is required

fields.name: DIsplayValidation
fields.fieldText: Cannot complete Sales Survey until quote is approved

fields.name: Requirefields
fields.fieldText:
Copy of DB, Existing CFC ,CFC Refresh/New and NBO new license are required if Sales Type is one of below value :

  • Aloha Essentials New Install
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh (like for like)
  • Aloha Essentials Refresh with Add On
  • SW Essentials Software Only
  • SW Essentials and Traditional Hardware
